text: Before certain men came from James,Note that in verse 9 James is listed before Peter and John, and in Acts 15:13 it is James who gives the verdict. James became the boss in Jerusalem, and I gather from what is recorded in Acts 21:18-25 that he was sliding back toward Judaism. he used to eat with the Gentiles; but when they came he began to draw back and separate himself, fearing those of the circumcision party.
